result.title: 1982 -  Centre for Environment, Fisheries & Aquaculture Science (Cefas) Collections of physical samples of otoliths and scales - hard structures used for age determination
result.name: 1982-centre-for-environment-fisheries-aquaculture-science-cefas-collections-of-physical-samples
result.notes:
Fish otolith (ear bone) and scale collection from various species. Spare 
otoliths still in the packets and sectioned otoliths on slide. From market 
sampling, research and commercial vessel cruises plus tagged fish recaptures.
